yaak.agent.event
Class AgentEvent

java.lang.Object
  java.util.EventObject
      yaak.agent.event.AgentEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AgentContextEvent, CommunicationEvent, MessageEvent
public abstract class AgentEvent
extends java.util.EventObject

AgentEvent is the foundation class for event classes in the agent framework. It provides an event ID state variable, which is inherited by all agent framework-related event classes.

Version:
$Id: AgentEvent.java 6 2005-06-08 17:00:15Z jsmith $
Author:
Jerry Smith
See Also:

Constructor Detail

AgentEvent

public AgentEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                  int eventID)

Initializes the event ID state variable and invokes the EventObject superclass constructor.

Parameters:
source - The object in which the event originates.
eventID - The event class-specific ID, or type.
